about.summary: Multiple contrast tests and simultaneous confidence intervals based on normal approximation. With implementations for binomial proportions in a 2xk setting (risk difference and odds ratio), poly-3-adjusted tumour rates, biodiversity indices (multinomial data)  and expected values under lognormal assumption. Approximative power  calculation for multiple contrast tests of binomial and Gaussian data.

Multiple contrast tests and simultaneous confidence intervals based on normal approximation. With implementations for binomial proportions in a 2xk setting (risk difference and odds ratio), poly-3-adjusted tumour rates, biodiversity indices (multinomial data)  and expected values under lognormal assumption. Approximative power  calculation for multiple contrast tests of binomial and Gaussian data.

name: r-mcpan
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.1-21' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mcpan
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/MCPAN_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/MCPAN/MCPAN_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a1a8e04ce53447d82e5e3889b90a0e22fb06ac80e2b3cee54fb808845e073560

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1004
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mcmcpack
    - r-magic
    - r-multcomp
    - r-mvtnorm
    - r-plyr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mcmcpack
    - r-magic
    - r-multcomp
    - r-mvtnorm
    - r-plyr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('MCPAN')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('MCPAN')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=MCPAN
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Multiple contrast tests and simultaneous confidence intervals based on normal approximation.
    With implementations for binomial proportions in a 2xk setting (risk difference
    and odds ratio), poly-3-adjusted tumour rates, biodiversity indices (multinomial
    data)  and expected values under lognormal assumption. Approximative power  calculation
    for multiple contrast tests of binomial and Gaussian data.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
